body: This also seems like a bug, btw.  This is saying that device memory and host memory are the same for SYCL, when it comes to memcopying.  E.g., that when you are copying from say, /CPU:0 to /device:SYCL:0, the tensor being used as input to the sycl device must remain in CPU memory.  Is that intended?
